meta.content: The most interesting and talked about stories, videos and pictures on the web. Breaking news on Technology, Politics, Entertainment, and more!

meta.title: Digg - What the Internet is talking about right now

div.div: It’s the most lethal day of the year, researchers say. But don’t blame stress or gluttony for the death rate’s spike. Why the real culprit may be good news for U.S. health care.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YEW4pJ&via=Digg&text=Why Christmas Is So Deadly

div.a: Follow Santa Live On The Google Santa Tracker

div.div: The North Pole air traffic control elves have just notified us that Santa has taken off! For the next day, you can visit the Google Santa Tracker to see where Santa’s headed next and keep tabs on how many presents he’s delivered.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UWqTAm&via=Digg&text=Follow Santa Live On The Google Santa Tracker

div.div: Someday, Oahu’s Koolau and Waianae mountains will be reduced to nothing more than a flat, low-lying island like Midway.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/V1AgPG&via=Digg&text=Hawaiian Islands Are Dissolving

div.a: What To Do On Christmas When You Don't Celebrate It

div.div: Christmas is the most wonderful time of the year for many people, but a large number of us don't celebrate the holiday, giving us nothing to do on December 25th. If you're without plans this year, here's how to make the most of your day off.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/12KPP2I&via=Digg&text=What To Do On Christmas When You Don't Celebrate It

div.a: School Shooters Tend To Tip Someone Off In Advance

div.div: There is no psychological profile specific enough to pinpoint school shooters in advance. But one common thread may offer the best opportunity to intercept them: They tend to be indiscreet during their planning stages.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YEXbpm&via=Digg&text=School Shooters Tend To Tip Someone Off In Advance

div.div: You're due at the tree in 60 seconds, and you've got nothing. Here are 11 cool delivery services that will save your life.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ROM23a&via=Digg&text=The Literal Last-Minute Gift Guide

div.a: Anonymous Targets Ohio Football Team Accused Of Rape

div.div: At least 11 high school football players have been targeted by Anonymous hackers after two of their teammates were charged with the rape of a 16-year-old Ohio girl.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UXDXWn&via=Digg&text=Anonymous Targets Ohio Football Team Accused Of Rape

div.div: WE'RE GOING TO NEED A BIGGER FREEZER

div.a: Harvard Scientist Proposes Refreezing The Arctic To Prevent Global Warming

div.div: Harvard University geoengineer and environmental scientist David Keith has a "plan B" in case of an environmental emergency.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Tejyyd&via=Digg&text=Harvard Scientist Proposes Refreezing The Arctic To Prevent Global Warming

div.a: Think Twice Before Using A Smartphone Charging Kiosk

div.div: Some clever hackers have discovered that smartphone charging kiosks can be easily used to do more harm than good if users are not careful.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TgNFVF&via=Digg&text=Think Twice Before Using A Smartphone Charging Kiosk

div.div: The road of excess leads to the palace of wisdom, Blake wrote, and for the last few decades no one in Hollywood has followed that road more assiduously than Quentin Tarantino.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/T6SO2t&via=Digg&text=Quentin's World

div.a: Even Israel Is Fact-Checking The NRA Now

div.div: On Sunday morning, Wayne LaPierre, CEO of the National Rifle Association, told the world that armed guards stopped school shootings in Israel. Israel begs to differ.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TQ9R7Z&via=Digg&text=Even Israel Is Fact-Checking The NRA Now

div.div: The village of Iitate in Japan's Fukushima prefecture was once home to 6,000 people. Today, however, it is essentially a ghost town.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WAGUh2&via=Digg&text=Reviving A Nuclear Ghost Town

div.div: The U.S. Navy recently announced that the third Ford-class supercarrier, due to be completed around 2025, will be named Enterprise. So how will the new supercarrier Enterprise (CVN-80) compare to the starship Enterprise (NCC- 1701)?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UiP91x&via=Digg&text=Enterprise Vs. Enterprise

div.a: New Roger Rabbit Book To Be Released

div.div: Besides his new book, Gary Wolf is planning on releasing a new Roger Rabbit book, about 20 years after his last one was published.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TkD2jn&via=Digg&text=New Roger Rabbit Book To Be Released

div.a: The Most Blinding Christmas Lawn Decorations On The Internet

div.div: In every neighborhood, there's always that one house that goes way overboard with the Christmas decorations. We combed the internet for the wildest and wackiest Christmas lawn displays we could find.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UngH6T&via=Digg&text=The Most Blinding Christmas Lawn Decorations On The Internet

div.a: Hitting Streaks In Baseball May Be Contagious

div.div: Like a popular politician with long “coattails,” a baseball player on a hitting streak seems to lift the performance of those around him.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/12u4Ner&via=Digg&text=Hitting Streaks In Baseball May Be Contagious

div.div: Four volunteer firefighters responding to an intense pre-dawn house fire were shot Monday morning, two fatally, leading to a shootout between a suspect and police in suburban Rochester, N.Y., police said.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WBxxxt&via=Digg&text=Firefighters Fatally Shot

div.a: 'Deport Piers Morgan' Petition Signed By More Than 30,000

div.div: The White House could be forced to respond to a gun lobby petition to deport Piers Morgan, which objects to how the CNN host and former British tabloid editor has attacked the right to bear arms in the wake of the Sandy Hook school massacre.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UoKtZ6&via=Digg&text='Deport Piers Morgan' Petition Signed By More Than 30,000

div.a: Photos Of RIM's New BlackBerry Leak

div.div: Today we have the first leaked photo of RIM's upcoming BB10 phone with a keyboard, the so-called N-Series.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TRknLZ&via=Digg&text=Photos Of RIM's New BlackBerry Leak

div.a: The Lunacy Of The Long-Distance Runner

div.div: Vomit, bleeding nipples and hallucinations. Why would anyone in their right mind run the Spartathlon?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TZhF5N&via=Digg&text=The Lunacy Of The Long-Distance Runner

div.div: FAKE IT TIL YOU MAKE IT

div.a: Amazon Angers Authors After Deleting Thousands Of Fake Reviews

div.div: Writers who rely on both fake and real reviews to sell copies of their books are crying foul as they take aim at Amazon.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UplCEq&via=Digg&text=Amazon Angers Authors After Deleting Thousands Of Fake Reviews

div.a: Report Claims Next-Gen iPads Due In March

div.div: Once again, your tablet is about to become obsolete.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UVnT7s&via=Digg&text=Report Claims Next-Gen iPads Due In March

div.a: 8 Amazing (And Totally Useless) Skills People Taught Animals

div.div: Remember the last time you taught a pet to do a simple trick like sit or roll over? Hours of coaxing, promises of treats, all to get an animal to do something that's ultimately pointless? Well, we're about to severely squash your sense of accomplishment, because apparently you could've spent that time doing something far more impressive, but still completely pointless.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UXEibR&via=Digg&text=8 Amazing (And Totally Useless) Skills People Taught Animals

div.div: ANYTHING YOU CAN DO, I CAN DO BETTER
"Without women and foot soldiers there would be no Mexican Mafia. They would be a bunch of guys sitting in their cells.”

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Tjfgb5&via=Digg&text=My Mom The Queenpin

div.a: Black Bear Hijacks Photographer's DSLR And Tries To Take Pictures

div.div: A wildlife photographer covering a family of black bears had his camera hijacked by one of the subjects.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RNtNeE&via=Digg&text=Black Bear Hijacks Photographer's DSLR And Tries To Take Pictures

div.div: Everyone's a victim of bad timing sometimes. These gadgets brought revolutionary new features to the market. They just did it a little too soon.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UnoIbX&via=Digg&text=10 Gadgets Ahead Of Their Time

div.a: How To Write Your Own Minesweeper AI

div.div: Ever just want to beat a game without playing it? Well you're in luck.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/W0t0m0&via=Digg&text=How To Write Your Own Minesweeper AI

div.a: Scientists Are Planning To Clone The Perfect Christmas Tree

div.div: Scientists in Germany are attempting to clone the perfect Christmas tree.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RMrhVP&via=Digg&text=Scientists Are Planning To Clone The Perfect Christmas Tree

div.div: WIN THE NEW YORK TIMES OR SOMETHING
Reading the first paragraph of this article will earn you a badge. If this made-up award makes you feel good about yourself, then you are on your way to understanding gamification.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UnUiX8&via=Digg&text=All The World's A Game

div.a: The NASA Plan To Turn An Asteroid Into A Orbiting Gas Station

div.div: NASA scientists are planning to capture a 5,00,000 kg asteroid, relocate it and transform it into a space station for astronauts to refuel at on their way to Mars.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/12A5gf9&via=Digg&text=The NASA Plan To Turn An Asteroid Into A Orbiting Gas Station
